Author: fancybanquet
Text: Do I have the right to still like myself ~~even if someone else doesn't?~~  Yes.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Before long all I needed was the first part of that question...’do I have the right to like myself’...and I felt strongly the answer was no. I wove that belief into the fabric of my reality, and then couldn’t quite understand why I was so desperately miserable. Couldn’t understand why no external approval or success could make the hurt and fear stop for long.   I’ve only started building on a new foundation after razing my life to the ground, but dang if I don’t feel safe in my own head for the first time in memory.   *“I’m still learning to love the parts of me that no one claps for” -Rudy Francisco*
